main_definition: In computing, a cursor is an indicator used to show the current position in text or other data entry fields where user input will be applied. It can also refer to a symbol that moves across a display screen as one interacts with it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Cursor (Computing) - An on-screen indicator used in computing, typically represented by an arrow or blinking dot, which shows the user's current location where they can input data.
meanings_and_examples.example: When typing a document, my cursor moves to different places as I press the keyboard.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Cursor (Symbol) - A symbol on a computer screen that indicates the position for user interaction. It often appears as an arrow or blinking dot.
meanings_and_examples.example: The text box has a moving cursor, which changes its shape depending on whether it's ready to accept input.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Cursor (Animation) - Refers to the motion of the cursor symbol on a screen as users interact with it.
meanings_and_examples.example: The cursor animated smoothly across the webpage, making navigation more intuitive.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Cursor (Data Representation) - In databases or data management systems, a cursor can be used to navigate and manipulate sequences of data. It acts like an iterator.
meanings_and_examples.example: The database query tool uses a cursor to retrieve rows from the table one by one.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Cursor (Graphic User Interface) - In graphical user interfaces, cursors are used as visual elements that respond when a user interacts with them, like clicking or hovering.
meanings_and_examples.example: When I moved my mouse pointer over the icon, it changed shape to indicate I could click on it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Cursor (Media) - In media and entertainment, 'cursor' might refer to a pointer in games that guides players through levels or objectives.
meanings_and_examples.example: The game used a cursor to show the target area where I had to aim my shots.
